Title: 083: Leveraging Your Experience into Data Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Head of Centre of Excellence and Customer Advocacy at The Information Lab, Emma Whyte. You will hear what a data-driven corporate culture looks like, understand the importance of having a data-driven culture and how to win stakeholders over, you will also learn about how Emma transitioned from a non-technical background to the world of Data Science, and how she is helping businesses now to make strategic data-driven decisions.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/83
